tooltip.color_experience: 設定/n經驗值數字條顏色
tooltip.color_absorption: 設定/n生命條/n吸收條顏色
tooltip.color_food: 設定/n飢餓值/n飽食度顏色
tooltip.color_poison: 設定/n中毒狀態/n生命條顏色
tooltip.color_wither: 設定/n凋零狀態/n生命條顏色
tooltip.color_hunger: 設定/飢餓狀態/n生命條顏色
tooltip.reduce_size: Reduce the size of the/nitem details by 50%%/n(This has no effect with/nthe modern style HUD)
tooltip.show_numbers_health: 顯示/隱藏生命條的數字/數值。如果你使用現代風格，/n這也會影響到飽食度
tooltip.show_numbers_food: 顯示/隱藏生命條/飽食度數字/數值,/n如果你使用現代風格，/n這也會影響到生命值
tooltip.show_numbers_experience: 顯示/隱藏經驗值條數字/數值
tooltip.render_player_face: 啟用/禁用顯示玩家skin頭像小部件
tooltip.show_armor: 顯示/隱藏裝備盔甲小部件/n耐久度顯示
tooltip.show_item_durability: 顯示/隱藏物品耐久度/小部件n配備的物品
tooltip.show_block_count: 顯示/隱藏物品數量小部件
tooltip.show_arrow_count: 顯示/隱藏箭的數量小部件/在裝備弓的時候
tooltip.enable_immersive_clock: 只有當玩家的背包中有時鐘時，/n才會顯示
tooltip.clock_time_format: 設定時間格式為/n24小時制或12小時制（AM/PM）
tooltip.enable_clock_color: 設定時鐘顯示的顏色，/n使其隨一天中的時間變化而改變顏色
tooltip.show_hunger_preview: 當從工具列中選擇一個食物選項時，/n顯示/生命條/飽食度的預覽
tooltip.enable_immersive_compass: 只有當玩家的背包中有羅盤時，/n才顯示羅盤小部件
tooltip.enable_compass_color: 啟用/禁用紅色/用於"N"符號
tooltip.enable_pickup: 啟用/禁用/物品拾取顯示
tooltip.pickup_duration: 設定拾取物品顯示的持續時間小部件
tooltip.limit_jump_bar: 和馬一起跳的時候/n顯示跳躍條
tooltip.invert_compass: 改變HUD羅盤/n固定N方向左和右
tooltip.show_update_notification: 當有新版本時，/n在主功能表中顯示通知
tooltip.show_convert_notification: 當發現舊的版本時，/n在主功能表中顯示通知
tooltip.show_durability_bar: 在小部件中顯示/物品耐久值
tooltip.show_entity_armor: 顯示你正在尋找的實體的護甲值（如果它有護甲）
tooltip.status_time: 顯示狀態效果/圖示的計時器
tooltip.force_render: Set this element to be rendered/nregardless if other mods disable it./n /n§cActivate this if another mod/n§cdisables this element
tooltip.render_vanilla: Force the vanilla version of/nthis element to be rendered instead./n /n§cActivate this if you encounter a/n§cproblem with this element
tooltip.prevent_event: Prevent the render event of/nthis element./nThis might disable features of/nother mods./n /n§cActivate this if another mod renders/n§csomething you don't want/n§cand can't disable it otherwise/n§cWARNING: Might disable other things, too
tooltip.prevent_element_render: Prevent this element from rendering./nOther mods can still render their/nelements that are hooked/nto this element./n /n§cActivate this if you want to only /n§crender the element of another mod.
tooltip.scale: Set the scaling of this element/n0.5 means the scaling is 50%%/n2.0 means the scaling is 200%%
tooltip.x_pos: Set the custom X/ncoordinate of this element/nRange: 0-1000/nThe value reflects the percent of/nthe screen from the left side/n250 would render this element at/n25%% from the left side of the screen
tooltip.y_pos: Set the custom Y/ncoordinate of/nthis element/nRange: 0-1000/nThe value reflects the percent of/nthe screen from the top side/n250 would render this element at/n25%% from the top side of the screen
tooltip.use_position: When activated this element uses the/ncustom X/Y Coordinates set in the/nsettings of this element/n(If the Hud-Type supports/ncustom coordinates for this element)
tooltip.health_percentage: 顯示生命值/以百分比表示
tooltip.hunger_percentage: 顯示飢餓值/n以百分比顯示
tooltip.mount_health_percentage: 以百分比形式顯示坐騎血量條/坐騎護甲值
tooltip.experience_percentage: 顯示經驗值/n以百分比表示
